__TOC__

Within the UATH code, provisioning machines is handled by subclasses of the <nowiki>[[Machine|Machine]]</nowiki> class.

Scripts should provision machines by creating an instance of a subclass of the <nowiki>[[Catalog|Catalog]]</nowiki> class, and using the request() method to obtain a machine.  Catalogs are intended to prevent resource collision.

End users not writing scripts can provision machines automatically using scripts provided in the UATH package.  Please see <nowiki>[[..-|the main UTAH page]]</nowiki> for that.

Some additional useful routines available include <nowiki>[[..-timeout|timeout]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[..-retry|retry]]</nowiki>, which both make use of <nowiki>[[..-commandstr|commandstr]]</nowiki>.  <nowiki>[[..-iso|iso]]</nowiki> can be used to list and extract files in images, <nowiki>[[..-group|group]]</nowiki> provides verification of user group membership, <nowiki>[[..-process|process]]</nowiki> provides routines for interaction with other system processes, and <nowiki>[[..-url|url]]</nowiki> provides URL validation code.
